UI_visible_response: It was produced by Chai Jing. The film focuses on the issue of air pollution, using a combination of data, on - the - spot investigations, and personal experiences to deeply analyze the causes, harms, and possible solutions of air pollution. It has attracted widespread attention and discussion on environmental issues in Chinese society, playing a certain role in promoting public awareness of environmental protection and promoting relevant policy - making and social actions to address air pollution.
